::Battera::

She jumped back just as the stalagtite falls from the ceiling of the 
cave and hits Vulios on the head.  She turned and looked at 
CyberShark. "Hold him down.  I need to do this before he wakes up."

She took out the cord from the back of her head and hooked it up to 
the connection behind Vulios's head.  She looked at CyberShark "OK,  
I"m all hooked up to him.  Just keep an eye out.  Incase of trouble, 
pull the plug and wake me up." She sat down next to Vulios and 
started transfering the data base of the past into Vulios. She 
started to close her eyes and her body slumped forward.  She passed 
out.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> "With pleasur, Commander." He wanted to tell her that killing a 
> Maximal would not promote peace, but that was a job left to the 
> strategic adviser. He started scanning the Maximal signal.
> 
> "Identify"
> 
> "Maximal Unit Foxfingers located in Base Segment 7G."
> 
> Starscream began to run, with guns out, towards Foxfingers.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois was getting upset
> 
> "What are you talkiing about? I HAVE NO PAST!!! Stop this. All I 
> remember is me slapping you. Why are you making me so confused? I 
> don't know what's going!" Vulois was so confused he shot on shot 
> upward, and a(what are those things called? They're like spikes in 
> caves, and the ones on the ceilng and the ones of the ground have 
> different names.)fell down his head, knocking him out.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Fliq
> 
> Fliq, still crying, carried Brix's toasted body behind Magnus.
>

> Prebon
> Prebon watched the battle between Slayer and Luniprine. He got 
upset 
> when he saw that Slayer wasn't firin. He couldn't let Slayer go 
back 
> to them. He needed to give him support through the battle.
> 
> "Come on Slayer! Fire! Kill him! You know you want too!"
